name: GRAM BOWMANâ€™S CORNED BEEF & CABBAGE
instructions: Add spice pack that comes with the corned beef, Bring to boil, then reduce to simmer, follow the instructions as to how long to simmer, at least a couple of hours till you have cooked the crap out of it!
After 1 hour of cooking,  drink a Guinness and continue drinking until morning
Add some onion, carrots, potatoes, cabbage and boil some more!
Serve with Soda Bread, Rye Bread and  Brown Mustard
